data.title: Professional Hair Care & Salon Services
data.meta_description: Explore Matrix's professional hair care, styling, and color, designed to bring premium solutions for every hair type.
data.text:

By submitting this form, I confirm I am a US resident, 16+, and (1) agree to Matrix's Terms Of Use and to receive marketing and promotional communications from Matrix and other L'Oreal brands, and (2) have read and acknowledge the Matrix's Privacy Policy and Notice Of Financial Incentives. Matrix uses personal information it collects and processes to provide you tailored and personalized content, advertisements, offers, and other marketing and promotional communications (including promotional emails) from Matrix and other L'Oreal brands, including based on your beauty profile, and for other purposes listed in Matrix's Privacy Policy.
